description:
At Gianfortune & Mionis, P.C., every personal injury case is our most important case — because we know it's most important to you. After all, law is our profession and our passion, not just our business. That is why we dedicate the time and attention every case deserves to secure the result you desperately need to make a full recovery.

From our location in Hauppauge, we represent accident victims across Long Island. While other New York law firms may pass your case onto an associate or paralegal, our firm is different. You work directly with one of our attorneys from start to finish, so you can rest easy knowing your case is always in good hands.

Our personal injury lawyers have a combined 50 years of experience representing those injured in a wide variety of situations: automobile accidents, slip-and-fall accidents, construction accidents, product defects, medical malpractice and more. We believe our combination of experience and personal attention is the key to achieving success for your case.

During your free initial consultation, we walk you through all the steps necessary to get started on your case. Our attorneys thoroughly investigate every accident, so we can build the best strategy for your success. We listen to your concerns and needs and are committed to meeting those needs as effectively as we can. Call us today to schedule an appointment, we'd be happy to answer any questions you may have.
